lines.text: I've always dreamed of being a big hit singer.
No, that's why they call them dreams.
I'd like to be the father-to-be.
You can't be the father and the brother! That's the kind of thing that messes kids up!
You didn't get pregnant with your legs closed!
Mom, what'd you mean when you said Dorian was your favorite?
Oh, Angus, I love you both.
[Holds thumb and forefinger an inch apart]
You don't wanna talk you wanna poke dents on my baby's head!
